Ansatz Functions (fd_greens.main.ansatze)

build_ansatz_gs(params: Sequence[float]) → qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit[source]

Constructs an N-electron ansatz of the encoded Hamiltonian. The ansatz is of the form \((R_y(\theta_2)\otimes R_y(\theta_3)) CZ (R_y(\theta_0)\otimes R_y(\theta_1)) |00\rangle\).

Parameters

params – A sequence of the parameters.

Returns

ansatz – The ansatz quantum circuit.

build_ansatz_e(params: Sequence[float]) → qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit[source]

Constructs the ansatz for (N+1)-electron states of the encoded Hamiltonian. The ansatz is of the form \((I \otimes R_y(\theta))|10\rangle\).

Parameters

params – A sequence of the parameters.

Returns

ansatz – The ansatz quantum circuit.

build_ansatz_h(params: Sequence[float]) → qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit[source]

Constructs the ansatz for (N-1)-electron states of the encoded Hamiltonian. The ansatz is of the form \((I \otimes R_y(\theta))|00\rangle\).

Parameters

params – A sequence of the parameters.

Returns

ansatz – The ansatz quantum circuit.
